Introduction to Meeedly

What is Meeedly?

The software includes features such as real-time participant engagement and focus analytics, media sharing, a questions channel, and an in-built whiteboard that can be used to enhance collaboration and interaction during online sessions. Meeedly's real-time analytics enable professionals to gauge the engagement level of participants and evaluate the effectiveness of their online training methods, assessments, or recruitment processes. Overall, Meeedly aims to encourage maybe more suitable effective, and engaging online interactions between professionals and their clients, students, or employees.

Meeedly for the corporate sector, 

Meeedly can help the corporate sector with online meetings, presentations, and training sessions. It provides a suite of tools to make online meetings interactive and engaging, including the ability to raise questions, share notes and files, use same-tab teaching tools, and more. Meeedly for Chrome offers real-time analytics to help companies visualize the engagement level of each participant during online meetings, and it is compatible with a variety of Skype, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. Be sure to mention the browser versions of these platforms. In addition, Meeedly can assist in monitoring and tracking employee performance during online remote work performance evaluation, allowing for real-time feedback and engagement. Overall, Meeedly can help companies to deliver high-quality online meetings and training sessions, and enhance employee engagement and performance.

Meeedly for the Educational Sector

Meeedly is an all-in-one solution for online lecture and exam monitoring and engagement. Designed for educational institutes and online instructors, it offers a range of features to make online lectures interactive and engaging, including raising questions, sharing physical notes, same-tab teaching tools, and more. With Meeedly, you can deliver high-quality lectures right from your home, and its real-time analytics help you visualize the engagement level of each participant during the lecture. Meeedly can be easily integrated with your existing video conferencing platform, Learning Management System, or corporate management system, making it a flexible and convenient solution for any educational setting.

How it works

Using Meeedly is simple and easy as Meeedly does not require many configurations with existing video conferencing platforms. Meeedly is an external solution that can be easily used with any of your favorite video conferencing platforms, Learning management system or corporate management system.

Meeedly analyses the engagement level of each participant connected via the Meeedly extension and updates the lecturer during the lecture in the Meeedly extension popping up in the meeting. 

It can detect how each participant interacts with the lecture, for example, how many participants watch the ongoing presence in the lecture, if the participant follows up with the lecture tasks such as finding something on the internet, if the participant keeps on working on the presentation tasks such as word documents, PDF or if they share any supporting media or even asking questions.

Here are the steps.
1. Get both you and your student an account on Meeedly.com
2. Install the extension on Google Chrome.
3. Create a meeting with the Meeedly app available at: https://meeedly.com/createmeeting/
4. Add your student as a participant in the Meeedly meeting.
5. Go to your favorite video conferencing platform and start your meeting.
6. Open the Meeedly extension that will list the meeting you created.
7. Click on the meeting displayed and it will pop up the meeting connecting request automatically.
8. Enjoy your engaging lecture meeting with Meeedly features.

How to use Meeedly page Link: https://meeedly.com/product/how-to-use/ 

Where to use
Meeedly can be used with video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Skype, Zoom, any type of LMS, Private Video conferencing platforms, or any Corporate Management Systems.
